title: Power Tailoring & Suiting
description: A focus on sharply tailored blazers, trousers, and full suits in both bold colors and classic neutrals. This trend empowers professional women with a confident silhouette.
regional_relevance: Strong in Cape Town and Johannesburg corporate hubs.

title: Luxe Knitwear
description: High-quality, comfortable knitwear such as cashmere scarves, merino wool sweaters, and knitted dresses are essential for a sophisticated winter look.
regional_relevance: High demand in colder climates like Cape Town and high-altitude cities.

title: Gorpcore & Utility Streetwear
description: Inspired by outdoor and technical gear, this trend features functional items like cargo pants, utility vests, and technical jackets.
regional_relevance: Very popular in urban centers like Johannesburg and Pretoria.

title: Y2K Revival
description: The early 2000s are back with low-rise jeans, graphic baby tees, velour tracksuits, and bucket hats.
regional_relevance: Strong among students and youth nationwide.

title: Bold Prints & Patterns
description: A move towards vibrant, eye-catching patterns including animal prints, bold florals, and African-inspired geometric designs.
regional_relevance: Especially popular in coastal cities like Durban and Cape Town for summer.

title: Sustainable & Natural Fabrics
description: Growing consumer demand for clothing made from organic cotton, linen, hemp, and recycled materials.
regional_relevance: A growing consideration for consumers nationwide, particularly in the Western Cape.

title: Athleisure Dominance
description: The fusion of athletic and leisure wear continues, with high-end track pants, performance t-shirts, and stylish sneakers being worn for everyday activities.
regional_relevance: Universal appeal across all major South African cities.

title: The Leather Look
description: Faux and real leather in the form of trousers, skirts, blazers, and trench coats is a key trend for a polished, edgy look.
regional_relevance: Popular for evening and professional wear in Johannesburg and Cape Town.

title: Oversized Silhouettes
description: Comfort is key with oversized hoodies, t-shirts, and jackets dominating the streetwear scene.
regional_relevance: A core element of the youth fashion scene in all metro areas.

title: Maximalist Accessories
description: Statement accessories are on the rise, including chunky chains, large tote bags, and colorful, oversized sunglasses.
regional_relevance: Strong trend across all fashion-conscious demographics.
